Articles.Content:
This is a small tutorial on making a custom radial separator. I came up with the design when I built super heavy lift systems back in .23. Since 24.2 I had to go back to this design as the normal radial separators had too much kick in them and would spin boosters back into my ship. The imgur descriptions tell the tale.

I run a heavily modded KSP but the design is doable in stock unmodded.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
